name: Emoji2025
description:
Idea: micro anno-like game, using only emojis, that focuses on the CO2 emissions of your constructions. 
This game is not finished (I clearly over-scoped, I'll try to complete it during the jam scoring week, I like the core). At its current state, it is just a sandbox.

Controls:
* left mouse for most of the interactions,
* right click to deselect/destroy,
* mouse wheel for zoom,
* space + 1,2,3 to control the speed

Credits:
* most sprites were taken from https://emojipedia.org
* I would love to be more formal, based on Climate Town https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=climate+town
* but clearly, an essential amount of the info comes from https://www.youtube.com/@kurzgesagt
